name: Flick Shoot Pro
description:
Flick Shoot Pro presents iPhone and iPad users the most entertaining soccer experience with impressive graphics and a realistic physics engine.

# NO ADS
# Improved graphics and playability
# Realistic goal keeper animations and physics engine
# Realistic kick and swerve controls
# Highscore for each game mode
# 4 Different game modes: Arcade, Time Attack, Goal Post, +Wall Kick
publishers: Mobil Interaktif Bilisim Hizmetleri Anonim Sirketi
